Conference Proceedings

These proceedings report results from ongoing projects for conferences. When those projects are ready, I'll share electronic versions [] of the conference proceedings here to support the timely dissemination of academic work.

2021

Woo, B. M., & Spelke, E. S. (in press). Limits to early mental state reasoning: Fourteen- to 15-month-old infants appreciate whether others can see objects, but not others’ experiences of objects. Proceedings of the 43rd Annual Meeting of the Cognitive Science Society. []

Woo, B. M., Liu, S., & Spelke, E. S. (in press). Open-minded, not naïve: Three-month-old infants encode objects as the goals of other people's reaches. Proceedings of the 43rd Annual Meeting of the Cognitive Science Society.

2020

Woo, B. M., & Spelke, E. S. (in press). How to help best: Infants’ changing understanding of multistep action sequences informs their evaluations of helping. Proceedings of the 42nd Annual Meeting of the Cognitive Science Society.
